buildCommand: npm run build:all && npx prisma generate && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); fs.mkdirSync('api/backend-dist', {recursive:true}); const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,file); const destPath=path.join(dest,file); if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath)}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath)}})}; copyDir('backend/dist','api/backend-dist')"
